name: Barrier Alert
description:
You are a world famous Formula 1 racer. One day you are driving down a road when the brakes in your car get damaged. You accidentally press the accelerator and now you car is constantly speeding up without brakes as you go zooming down a under-construction road. 

Barrier Alert is a fun-to-play easy game with just 2 controls.

  1. 'A' to move left
  2. 'D' to move right

You will have to dodge multiple Barriers to touch a blue color box at the end. If you touch this box you win and you can proceed to the next level. However if you crash into the Barriers or the walls you lose.

Good Luck and have fun playing!

Do you like playing Action-Packed Shooting games? If you do then be sure to check out this game.           

https://nikthegreat2020.itch.io/the-living-dead                                                                             

Do you enjoy playing Tower Defense games? If you do then don't forget to check this out.        

https://nikthegreat2020.itch.io/space-defender
